name: DiskSpin
description:
How to play:

  • Spin the disk and shoot at the icons before they get to the edge.
  • Green icons add 5 points when shot.
  • Red icons decrease 5 points and the life bar when they reach the edge.
  • Every 100 points the game becomes faster, thus increasing difficulty.

Controls:

  • A and D to spin the disk.
  • J and K or L-Click and R-Click to shoot the Green and Red Bullets respectively.
  • Esc to pause.

*On desktop version you can customize controls.

  • Font - Peepo by André Felipe.
  • Font - DeadCRT by NALGames.
  • Any other asset on the game was made by the game's author.
